description:
Little white flower: Weak, innocent, simple, pitiful, kind-hearted, just like a dodder flower.

In an accident, Ruan Bai was forced to bind to a white lotus flower cultivation system and had to play the role of a little white flower in various escape games!

When the evil spirit passes by the door and everyone holds their breath.
[Ding! New random task: Scream out in fear and attract the attention of evil spirits!]

When everyone is running wildly, trying to get rid of the murderer behind them.
[Ding! New random task: The spider by the roadside made you cry in fright, weakly fall to the ground!]

When the rich handsome guy impatiently throws her a wad of cash.
[Ding! New random task: Throw the money directly on the ground and tell him not to use money to insult yourself!]

Ruan Bai: …Are you sure you didn’t come to pit against me???>
